entries.meaning: A flat stone used to form a hearth.

examples: I am going to my own hearth-stone, / Bosomed in yon green hills alone,

entries.meaning: A soft kind of stone used to whiten doorsteps, scour floors, etc.

verbs.description: hearthstone (third-person singular simple present hearthstones, present participle hearthstoning, simple past and past participle hearthstoned)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To scour, as a floor, with hearthstone.
examples: We've a woman come in twice a week, to scrub, and red-brick, and hearthstone, and black-lead, and the rest we manage ourselves.
